welcome.title: Welcome to Stegos Wallet
bootstrap.step.one.label: Password protection
bootstrap.step.two.label: Sync
bootstrap.step.three.label: Bugs Reports & Terms of Use
protect.title: Protect your wallet
protect.description: Set a password to prevent an unauthorized access to Stegos Wallet data on your computer, including account names, transactions and public keys.
protect.attention: Make sure you remeber your password. Do not share it! Losing your password requires resetting Stegos Wallet and re-adding accounts. Resetting Stegos Wallet does not affect your crypto assets.
syncing.in.progress.description: Your wallet is synchronizing with the blockchain...
syncing.failed.description: Something went wrong, please restart Stegos Wallet
terms.title: Bug Reports & Terms of Use
terms.share.data: Share anonymized data to help improve Stegos Wallet
terms.send.reports: Automatically send reports to help Stegos fix bugs
terms.accept:
By continuing, you acknowledge that you have read and agree to
the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.sort.account.name: Account name
accounts.waiting: Scanning blockchain for your tokens, please wait...
account.receive.description: Click the 'Receive' button below to get your account address and start receiving tokens.
account.restore.description: Click the 'Restore from recovery phrase' button to restore an existing account.
edit.account.title: Edit Account
edit.account.backup.subtitle: Account Backup
edit.account.name.title: Account Name
edit.account.backup.title: Account Backup
delete.account: Your account “{name}” will be removed from this device. You cannot undo this operation!
backup.step.one.label: Write down
backup.step.two.label: Verify
backup.step.one.description: The phrase is case sensitive. Please make sure you write it down. You will need it to restore your account.
backup.step.two.description: In order to restore your existing account, please fill all words from the recovery phrase in the right order.

send.no.certificate.description: Warning: No payment certificate will be generated.
send.with.certificate.description: A payment certificate will be generated. You will be able to prove that you made the payment above.
send.cloak.description: This will make all your public tokens private. Do this now!
send.public.description: Warning: This payment is NOT private and will be seen by everyone!
send.transaction.sent.title: Transaction sent
send.transaction.sent.description: Your account balance will be updated shortly.
send.transaction.sent.certificate: The payment certificate for this transaction will be available in Last Operations for {account}
restore.title: Restore Account
restore.subtitle: In order to restore your existing account, please fill in the words from the recovery phrase in the right order.
chart.public.amount.info: Convert public tokens to private before spending.
